description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget 'DashboardTab' that represents a dashboard tab in a mobile application UI. It contains UI components such as market overview, alerts, top movers, and quick actions, and manages data fetching and display logic for these components.

classes.name: DashboardTab
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that builds the main dashboard UI with market overview, alerts, top movers, and quick actions.

classes.name: _OverviewRow
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a row of overview items in cards.

classes.name: _OverviewItem
classes.description: A simple data class holding the title, value, and delta percentage for overview display.

classes.name: _AlertTile
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays an alert item with an icon, title, detail, and timestamp.

classes.name: _QuickAction
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that represents a quick action chip with an icon, label, and tap callback.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the 'DashboardTab', including layout and UI components.
